body_html:
@tatatodd I did read those pages. But based on my understanding, the training time (wall-clock time) is negatively correlated with samples/sec. If samples/sec increases, then the training time should decrease.

Did you mean there is no direct relationship between training time and samples/sec?

body:
@tatatodd I did read those pages. But based on my understanding, the training time (wall-clock time) is negatively correlated with samples/sec. If samples/sec increases, then the training time should decrease. 

Did you mean there is no direct relationship between training time and samples/sec?
